div.script: $(document).ready(function() {CheckScript('ModuleView');CheckScript('Mustache'); });

span.div: Preparing the children of today for tomorrow...

The Roxbury Township Public Schools, a dynamic and thriving district, in partnership with a supportive and collaborative community, inspires and empowers all learners to flourish as ethical and global citizens in the 21st century.

a.title: Go to comments for VISION AND MISSION - DO NOT DELETE - LEAVE AS 1st FROM TOP
Go to comments for ANNOUNCEMENTS - DO NOT DELETE - LEAVE AS 2nd FROM TOP

div.span: Notice is hereby given that theRegular Meetings of the Roxbury Township Board of Education scheduled to be held onApril 27, 2020at the Lincoln Roosevelt School Auditorium (34 N. Hillside Ave., Succasunna, NJ)and on May 11, 2020 at Roxbury High School (1 Bryant Dr., Succasunna, NJ) will instead beconducted virtually on those dates commencing at 6:00 PM. Formal action will be taken.

span.strong: Prior to the start time ofa

div.span: meeting, please revisit this webpage where a registration link to join the meeting will be made available. Registration is required.

a.title: Go to comments for BOE, Virtual Mtgs 20200427, 20200511 - Links forthcoming
Click for our FID Central Hub

img.style: display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;
img.title: Parent Information Session

a.title: Click for Morning Messages

div.span: For updates & important learning information during our Flexible Instruction Days, students& their families are encouraged to view our Morning Messages posted each day during the week on:https://sites.google.com/roxbury.org/morning-message/home?authuser=0

a.title: Supt's Communications

div.span: Click hereto view Supt Radulic's updates regarding Roxbury's FID and for further information on Novel Coronavirus.

img.title: Click to log in to Classlink
img.alt: Click to log in to Classlink

div.span: Click hereto log in to ClassLink.Reminder: Please do not share login credentials with other students or families.

span.br: On Fri. 3/13/20, Dr. Seipp and Mr. Zegar hosted a parent information session on our Flexible Instruction Day plan.Toreview the plans and materials discussed:

div.span: Click hereto view the PowerPoint discussed during the session.
Click herefor an Adobe Spark webpagethat also outlines the basic procedures of flexible instruction days that were explained during the session.

a.title: Click to complete our Help Desk Request Form

img.title: Click for our Help Desk Request Form
img.alt: Click for our district's Help Desk Request Form

span.span: Contact Roxbury Public Schools' Tech Dept @ 973-584-8121 or click hereto complete our Help Desk Request Form.

a.title: Go to comments for FID - Central Hub

div.span: Optimumis enabling their wide area WiFi to be accessed at no charge by anyone with a WiFi enabled device within their coverage area. Students who do not have WiFi at home or who may have intermittent service can try to see if they can connect to the WiFi network with the SSID "optimumwifi". There is no username or password required.

In addition, Optimum is offering Altice Advantage Internet free until the end of the 2019-2020 school year, where available, to any household in our service area that has a student in K-12 and/or college. E
ligible households interested in this solution can call: 866-200-9522 to enroll.Click here to learn more (para la carta en espaol hagaclic aqu).

hr.span: As of 3/13/20, Comcast has announced that Xfinity hotspots across the country will be available to anyone who needs them for free including non-Xfinity customers for the next 60 days. Click here to learn more.

a.title: Go to comments for WiFi Notice | 20200415

td.div: Kindergarten registration forRoxbury Township School District for 2020/2021, begins in March. Children must be five years old on or before October 1, 2020 to participate.Click herefor more information regarding Roxbury's Entrance Age Policy (P5112). If thereare any questions regarding the policy or procedure, please reach out to Assistant Superintendent Dr. Chuck Seipp atcseipp@roxbury.orgor by calling 973-584-6799.

div.strong: More information on registration dates for each school can be foundhere.

a.title: Go to comments for Kindergarten Registration 2020-2021

td.div:
Rox-THON Flocking Fundraising
Flocking is back at Roxbury! It will begin this fall and continue until the ground freezes, before resuming next spring; all weather dependent.Flocking is super simple! Flocking is when you harmlessly prank your friends by signing up for us to put a flock of plastic flamingoes on their lawn.Requests can be made via Google Formsor get your anti-flocking insurance.

a.title: Go to comments for Rox-THON Flocking Fundraising

span.p: Preparing the children of today for tomorrow...

The Roxbury Township Public Schools, a dynamic and thriving district, in partnership with a supportive and collaborative community, inspires and empowers all learners to flourish as ethical and global citizens in the 21st century.

p.img: Our districtis located in Morris County, approximately 36 miles west-northwest of New York City, 12.8 miles west-northwest of Morristown, New Jersey and 26 miles east of the Delaware Water Gap on the border of New Jersey and Pennsylvania. Approximately 23,000 residents in the towns of Landing, Lower Berkshire Valley, Kenvil, Succasunna, Ledgewood, and Port Morris, live within the districts 22-square mile boundary. Students who live in Mt. Arlington, and parts of Wharton and Flanders send their students to attend High School in Roxbury.

hr.div: In 2011,Roxburybecame the first community in the state to be honored as one of Americas Promise 100 Best Communities for Young People, thanks to its dedication to youth. The Township operates more than 200 programs to serve the children within its boundaries. In 2014,Safewise.comranked Roxbury No. 42 in its list of 50 Safest Cities in New Jersey.
We offersmaller class sizes and individual attention along with a variety of extra-curricular opportunities and a range of honors, advanced placement and college-preparatory courses.
Are you a new resident of Roxbury? Welcome! Read our At Home in Roxburybrochure.

In 2019,Roxbury completed its three-year strategic plan. To view presentations and information on planning meeting outcomes, clickhere.

div.p: RSS is a standardized format that lets you subscribe to a websites content. The subscription is called a feed. Once you subscribe to an RSS feed, you can view links to the content on that page from your personalized service homepage. You can add feeds to your RSS reader using the feed's URL.
